title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1320/1999 of 23 June 1999 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2257/92 laying down detailed rules for implementing the specific arrangements for supplying Madeira with certain vegetable oils
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1320/1999
of 23 June 1999
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2257/92 laying down detailed rules for implementing the specific arrangements for supplying Madeira with certain vegetable oils
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2257/92 is replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 June 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 173, 27.6.1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 76, 13.3.1998, p. 6.
(3) OJ L 219, 4.8.1992, p. 44.
(4) OJ L 187, 1.7.1998, p. 24.
ANNEX
Forecast supply balance for Madeira for certain vegetable oils for the period 1 July 1999 to 30 June 2000
>TABLE>
